description: An intensive masterclass on film directing, covering advanced techniques, working with actors, visual storytelling, and creating a distinct directorial style.
Explore the art and science of cinematography lighting, learning advanced techniques to create mood, atmosphere, and visual impact in your films.
A hands-on workshop designed to develop acting skills specific to film, covering character analysis, on-camera techniques, and audition preparation.
Learn the art of production design for films, including creating sets, selecting props, and establishing visual aesthetics to enhance storytelling.
Explore effective marketing and promotional strategies for films, including audience targeting, social media campaigns, and film publicity.
An in-depth study of film distribution and exhibition, covering distribution strategies, release plans, and the role of theaters and streaming platforms.
